I felt confident at first but doubted myself on the second shot.", "personal_info": "# Player Profile

## Physical Attributes
- Height: 6'2" (188 cm)
- Weight: 185 lbs (84 kg)
- Age: 28
- Playing Style: Baseline aggressive

## Health History
- Anxiety: Moderate (reported during high-pressure matches)
- Fitness Level: Good (trains 4x per week)

## Mental Characteristics
- Confidence Level: Medium (struggles under pressure)
- Recovery Speed: Slow (takes 2-3 points to recover after mistakes)
- Focus: Good at baseline, loses focus at net

## Previous Performance
- Win Rate: 65%
- Strengths: Powerful baseline shots (220+ kmh), consistency
- Weaknesses: Mental composure on break points, net play", "past_conversation": {"session_count": 3, "recurring_issues": ["Pressure on break points", "Losing confidence after unforced errors", "Inconsistent first-serve success"], "mental_triggers": ["Making aggressive shot and missing", "Being down in the score", "Playing against stronger opponents"], "successful_techniques": ["Breathing exercise (4-4-4 count)", "Positive self-talk before serve", "Visualization of successful comebacks"], "session_notes": ["Session 1: Identified pressure sensitivity, started breathing drills", "Session 2: Improved first-point composure, still struggling on break points", "Session 3: Better recovery after errors, needs more practice on consistency"], "progress_notes": "Making steady progress. Breathing exercises helping. Focus now on mental resilience on break points."}}
